reviewText:
Significant amount of data about earthquakes over the years with images and some survivor stories. Aspires to explain how the scale works. Includes some CGI projections of what may possibly happen in areas thought ready to shake. Perhaps to sell the product it sometimes relies on Doomsday type hysteria and busy graphics.

Eventually mentions that coastal areas may then experience a GIANT WAVE which could also do SERIOUS damage.
awesome video with a great narrator. If you have an interest in seismology then this is a definite must-buy.
